Sector: Verisk Analytics is a data analytics providers serving customers in insurance, energy and specialized markets and financial services. Using advanced technologies to collect and analyze data, Verisk draws on unique data assets and deep domain expertise to provide innovations that are integrated into customer workflows. The company offers predictive analytics and decision support solutions to customers in rating, underwriting, claims, catastrophe and weather risk, natural resources intelligence and economic forecasting. Verisk reports through three business segments: Insurance, Energy and Specialized Markets and Financial Services. Insurance Segment serves P&C insurance customers. Energy and Specialized Markets Segment provides data analytics services across the natural resources value chain. Services Segment - The company maintains the largest bank account consortia to offer competitive benchmarking, decisioning algorithms, business intelligence and customized analytic services to financial institutions.
